name: Yggdrasil Chronicles - A Record of Valkadia (Public Demo)
name_original: Yggdrasil Chronicles - A Record of Valkadia (Public Demo)
description:
Yggdrasil Chronicles - A Record of Valkadia is a turn-based JRPG, set in a fantasy world named Valkadia, and also the sequel of  Yggdrasil Chronicles - A Tale of Cindrivia. This game is made on RPG Maker MV by Ryan Entertainment Studio.

This is the first public demo of the game, providing you the early footages and a better understanding of game mechanics. Please keep in mind that this is just a demo, and it means there are a lot of unfinished features. The game is still in an active development. I recommend you to play the first game I mentioned above first  (If you have not played it) before getting into this one.

Basic information:

  1. The demo version contains:
    1.  A third of the main story, and there is no side quests.
    2.  Some main features of the game, allow you to have a better understanding of game mechanics.
    3.  Two languages: English and Vietnamese, can be changed at anytime in Options menu.
    4.  Demo ends after you finish the quest in Luvinia City (Step 90 in main quest).
    5. WARNING: Game contains violence and strong language, suitable for 16+ players only.
  2. Some instructions for this demo:
    1.  Control:
      1. Movement/Direction: Arrow buttons or Left Mouse
      2. Confirm actions: Z, Space or Enter or Left Mouse
      3. Cancel actions/Open menu: X or ESC or Right Mouse
      4. Dash/Skip Conversations: Shift
      5. Circle Tools: Q and W
      6. Use selected tool: Alt
      7. Turn on/off Oil Lamp: 1
      8. Open command: ~ (Above Tab and it is not working during battles)
    2. This game have a simple auto battle. To turn it on/off, just open command by pressing ~ (Above Tab) and type -autobattle on/off.
    3. Five (05) Difficulty levels: Very Easy, Easy, Normal, Hard, Very Hard. You can change difficulty level at anytime in your Menu/Options.
    4. For every level, your characters gain 6 JP, which is used for upgrading stats. To access the Stat Investment window, open your menu and choose "Stat Investment".
    5. Skills can be learned/reset from certain NPCs in Magic Shops, or inside some Churches, Cathedral.
    6. For TOOLS, to circle between tools, press Q or W. To use selected tool, press Alt.
    7. Some items which can be disassembled will be grouped into Breakable Items inside your Inventory. Some tools or quest items only appear after disassembling certain items. To do that, go to your Breakable Items, select an item and choose Dissassemble.
    8. If you miss something in conversations, you can view the backlog by pressing Tab. It will display the whole conversation from the beginning.
    9. For some certain situations, you have to craft some items in order to move forward. To do so, gather all required materials, then open Menu/Craft to start crafting.

Because of the file size, the game cannot be uploaded directly to Itch.io. To download the game, please follow the Google Drive link. If you have any questions, suggestions or bug reports, please contact me here in the comment section, or send me a message directly to my facebook page. And if you enjoy the demo and wish to support me, I am very grateful to receive your generous donations.

Thank you very much for participating in the testing phase of the first demo!
